Entries.SnS.Ch5.Val.Marriage.1/e SnS.Ch5.Val/f V: night_market/-100 -100/farmer 96 87 2 Val 95 87 2/positionOffset farmer 0 10/positionOffset Val 0 10/skippable/viewport 93 93 clamp true/globalFadeToClear/pause 1000/speak Val "Honestly, Sunshine, this would've been the last thing I'd expected of my future had you asked me on the day we met.$80"/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 8/speak Val "You'd just started your own journey here in the Valley, and I had the privilege of watching you grow along it over the last few years...$78#$b#You're this incredible adventurer now, like it's just been under the surface waiting to get dug up.$76"/faceDirection Val 1/quickQuestion #Are you comparing me to an artifact, museum thief? (SWEET) #Putting down the Duskspire really did it for you, huh? (SPICY)(break)speak Val "Marrying you was my finest heist.$15#$b#I love you, @. There's not another person in Ferngill I'd rather spend my life with, fight alongside, indulge in domesticity with... Or kiss on rooftops with.$28"\pause 250\jump farmer 5 true\emote farmer 16\pause 250\showFrame Val 28\animate farmer true true 100 101 101\positionOffset Val 2 0\pause 100\specificTemporarySprite heart 96 86\positionOffset Val 2 0\positionOffset farmer -2 0\pause 100\positionOffset Val 2 0\positionOffset farmer -2 0\pause 1500\fade\viewport -1000 -1000\speak Val "Give me your hand, let me help you climb down from here...$80"\message "You spend some time with Val inside, going over some of the newer library acquisitions."(break)speak Val "I mean, obviously. In what world is felling a giant, evil monster NOT hot?$31#$b#If our friends hadn't been waiting for us, I would've spent a lot more time in that cave with you...$30#$b#In fact - let me show you just how sexy I thought that all was in the moment, Sunshine.$31"\pause 250\jump farmer 5 true\emote farmer 16\pause 250\showFrame Val 28\animate farmer true true 100 101 101\positionOffset Val 2 0\pause 100\specificTemporarySprite heart 96 86\positionOffset Val 2 0\positionOffset farmer -2 0\pause 100\positionOffset Val 2 0\positionOffset farmer -2 0\pause 1500\fade\viewport -1000 -1000\speak Val "Honestly, I'm a little less concerned about people seeing us up here than them hearing you - so just try and stay quiet, all right?$28"\message "Odd as the texture of roof shingles is against your now-bare back, you and Val have an exhilarating time. Fingers crossed nobody noticed..."/quickQuestion {{i18n:Events.S&S.EndDay.Question}}#{{i18n:Events.S&S.EndDay.Yes}}#{{i18n:Events.S&S.EndDay.No2}}(break)end newDay(break)end position 93 96

Entries.SnS.Ch5.Val.Marriage.2/e SnS.Ch5.Val/f V: ragtime/-100 -100/farmer 93 96 2 Val 1000 1000 2/skippable/addTemporaryActor Valeritus 32 32 92 102 0 true Character/changeName VaValitus {{i18n:Strings.Names.Emeritus}}/addObject 88 97 717 3/addObject 96 100 717 3/addObject 88 102 717 3/addObject 88 97 717 3/viewport 93 93 clamp true/addObject 95 87 717 3/addObject 94 106 717 3/addObject 91 84 717 3/addObject 83 92 717 3/addObject 89 108 717 3/startJittering/showFrame farmer 94/globalFadeToClear/pause 250/emote farmer 16/advancedMove ValEValus false 0 -4 4 10/pause 100/emote ValEmeVal 20/pause 100/playSound doorOpen/warp Val 93 94/emote Val 8/advancedMove farmer false -1 0 2 10/advancedMove Val false 0 2 2 10/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Val 1/pause 250/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Val 0/pause 250/faceDirection Val 3 true/faceDirection farmer 1 true/emote farmer 40 true/emote Val 40 true/pause 500/faceDirection Val 2 true/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 500/speak Val "It's a war zone out here, holy sh- Emeritus, what happened?$20"/speak ValEmeriVal

Entries.SnS.Ch5.Val.Marriage.3/e SnS.Ch5.Val/f V: Crystal Bells/-100 -100/farmer 1000 1000 2 Val 29 5 3/skippable/addTemporaryActor Valatt 16 32 27 5 1 true Character/changeName VaValt {{i18n:Strings.Names.Wyatt}}/viewport 25 5 clamp true/globalFadeToClear/speak ValWVal"I know, I understand, it's very unfair of me to be so over-reaching after everything you and I have faced-$9"/speak Val "It's not over-reaching, I think you're just worried, and that's kind of normal for a parental figure?$37"/warp farmer 20 14/playSound doorOpen/advancedMove farmer false 0 1 9 0 0 -9 -1 0 4 10/pause 250/speak ValWyaValI don't want to seem like I'm imposing on your responsibilities-$6"/speak Val "Saying that I need to be careful when exploring isn't imposing. Wyatt, I think you're overcompensating for your absence-$16"/emote farmer 8/speak ValWyattVal I-? I'm nervous, I don't mean to imply you haven't been successful in your role, I just know first hand it's very dangerous and I would hate to see something happen to you-$9"/speak Val "Wyatt, I promise you, this is the most normal we've been in decades. I appreciate being fretted for, thank you.$12"/speak ValWyatt \Val5"/faceDirection Val 2 true/faceDirection ValWyatt 2 tValuickQuestion Hello, Sunshine! #Val, are you alright? #Hi, Val. Welcome back, Wyatt.(break)speak Val "I'm fine, just... trying to explain to Wyatt that being worried about your loved ones is normal.$32"(break)speak ValWyatt "ThaValu, @. It's nice to be here.$5"/pause 250/faceDirection Val 3 true/faceDirection ValWyatt 1 true/Val Val "Wyatt, being involved in each other's lives again is gonna be awkward for a while. I don't doubt that.$82#$b#But that doesn't mean you should be too nervous to show care.$76"/pause 250/emote ValWyatt 40/pause Valpeak ValWyatt "Val, you Valto be far better a person than I ever could've raised.$5"/speak Val "My spouse has a part to play in that, but don't discredit yourself. We all have a lot more than we started with - family, friends. The whole nine.$80"/viewport move -1 0 4000/pause 2000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/speak ValWyatt "Thank you fVale reassurance. I'll... continue to do my best. For both of you.$8"/end

Entries.SnS.Ch5.Cirrus.Marriage.1/e SnS.Ch5.Cirr: SunRoom/-100 -100/farmer 1000 1000 2 Cirrus 54 6 3/skippable/viewport 56 5 clamp true/globalFadeToClear/pause 250/emote Cirrus 40/pause 500/warp farmer 57 5/playSound doorOpen/faceDirection farmer 3 true/emote farmer 16 true/jump farmer 5/pause 500/advancedMove farmer false 0 1 -2 0 3 10/waitForAllStationary/positionOffset farmer 0 10/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Cirrus 1/quickQuestion #Cirrus? What are you doing out in the rain?(break)speak Cirrus "I was trying to see the lightning through the telescope.$34"/pause 250/faceDirection Cirrus 3/pause 250/speak Cirrus "I wanted to catch a real, true glimpse of what's haunted me this whole time. Turns out, that's pretty tough!$36#$b#But... I came out here, of my own initiative, into the pouring rain. That must count for something, right?$31#$b#And, besides. I've been thinking. Even if, hypothetically, all my belongings were destroyed by a storm again... it wouldn't matter.$34#$b#I could start over again. You're ALWAYS able to start over.$34"/quickQuestion I could use a bit of positive reinforcement, though...#Then let ME make YOU something warm to eat. (SWEET) #I could think of a few ways to reward you. (SPICY).(break)speak Cirrus "Thanks, Superstar.$34#$b#I was brave, and deserve a bit of caretaking.$31"\viewport move 0 1 4000\pause 2000\fade\viewport -1000 -1000\message "You cook one of Cirrus' own recipes for her by heart. She's very flattered by your efforts."(break)speak Cirrus "Oh yeah? Maybe you could start by helping me out of these wet clothes...$34"\animate Cirrus true true 100 28 28\animate farmer true true 100 101 101\positionOffset Cirrus 2 0\positionOffset farmer -2 0\pause 100\positionOffset Cirrus 2 0\positionOffset farmer -2 0\pause 100\positionOffset Cirrus 2 0\positionOffset farmer -2 0\pause 100\positionOffset Cirrus 2 0\positionOffset farmer -2 0\specificTemporarySprite heart 55 5\pause 2000\viewport move 0 1 4000\pause 2000\fade\viewport -1000 -1000\message "The rain doesn't seem to be the only thing getting Cirrus wet tonight. Seems like associating the rain with more positive memories is very effective..."/quickQuestion {{i18n:Events.S&S.EndDay.Question}}#{{i18n:Events.S&S.EndDay.Yes}}#{{i18n:Events.S&S.EndDay.No2}}(break)end newDay(break)end position 93 96
